mng: to leak (of water or gas), to drip, to drain, to discharge, to leak out, to divulge (secrets), to give vent (to anger, spite etc), to disperse, to reduce

to drain (by leading off water), to unburden oneself, to divulge, to leak a secret
to reveal a secret, to divulge, to leak
(of a liquid or gas) to leak, to divulge (a secret), to leak
to release flood water, flood discharge
to leak (information), to divulge, also pr. [xie4 lou4]
